mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO, DDL_IDX_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_COL_PNM, DDL_IDX_COL_LNM, RQST_DCD, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, DDL_IDX_ID, DDL_IDX_PNM, DDL_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_COL_ORD, SORT_TYP, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID

A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO, A.DDL_IDX_COL_ID, A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM, A.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.DDL_IDX_ID, A.DDL_IDX_PNM, A.DDL_COL_ID, A.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD, A.SORT_TYP, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, DDL_IDX_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_COL_PNM, DDL_IDX_COL_LNM, RQST_DCD, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, DDL_IDX_ID, DDL_IDX_PNM, DDL_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_COL_ORD, SORT_TYP, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ddlIdxColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlIdxColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlIdxColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlIdxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlIdxColOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sortTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
insert into WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
RQST_DTL_SNO,
RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO,
DDL_IDX_COL_ID,
DDL_IDX_COL_PNM,
DDL_IDX_COL_LNM,
RQST_DCD,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
DDL_IDX_ID,
DDL_IDX_PNM,
DDL_COL_ID,
DDL_IDX_COL_ORD,
SORT_TYP,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rqstDtlDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ddlIdxColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlIdxColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlIdxColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlIdxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlIdxColOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{sortTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1,
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOW(), #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(),
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL
DDL_IDX_COL_ID = #{ddlIdxColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = #{ddlIdxColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_IDX_COL_LNM = #{ddlIdxColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_IDX_ID = #{ddlIdxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_IDX_PNM = #{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_COL_ID = #{ddlColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_IDX_COL_ORD = #{ddlIdxColOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SORT_TYP = #{sortTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL set DDL_IDX_COL_ID = #{ddlIdxColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = #{ddlIdxColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_IDX_COL_LNM = #{ddlIdxColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_IDX_ID = #{ddlIdxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_IDX_PNM = #{ddlIdxPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_COL_ID = #{ddlColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_IDX_COL_ORD = #{ddlIdxColOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SORT_TYP = #{sortTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

--요청구분 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL A SET (REG_TYP_CD, DDL_IDX_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_ID) = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.DDL_IDX_COL_ID) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , MAX(B.DDL_IDX_COL_ID) AS DDL_IDX_COL_ID , MAX(B.DDL_IDX_ID) AS DDL_IDX_ID FROM WAM_DDL_IDX_COL B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX C ON C.DDL_IDX_ID = B.DDL_IDX_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX D ON C.DDL_IDX_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_PNM AND C.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID WHERE B.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO ) , VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --DDL에 존재하고 PDM에 없는 컬럼을 삭제대상으로 추가한다.... INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , DDL_IDX_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_COL_PNM, DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , RQST_DCD , REG_TYP_CD , VRF_CD , DDL_IDX_ID , DDL_IDX_PNM , DDL_COL_ID , DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , SORT_TYP , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT B.RQST_NO , B.RQST_SNO , B.RQST_DTL_SNO , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(X.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND X.RQST_DTL_SNO = B.RQST_DTL_SNO ) + (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , D.DDL_IDX_COL_ID , D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , 'DD' AS RQST_DCD , 'D' AS REG_TYP_CD , '4' AS VRF_CD , C.DDL_IDX_ID , C.DDL_IDX_PNM , D.DDL_COL_ID , D.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , D.SORT_TYP , D.OBJ_DESCN , D.OBJ_VERS, D.FRS_RQST_DTM, D.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX C ON C.DDL_IDX_ID = B.DDL_IDX_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX_COL D ON D.DDL_IDX_ID = C.DDL_IDX_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X WHERE B.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = X.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM )
mapper.update: --인덱스컬럼테이블 컬럼ID Update... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X SET DDL_COL_ID = ( SELECT D.DDL_COL_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = B.RQST_DTL_SNO INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL C ON A.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL D ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO AND D.DDL_COL_PNM = B.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND D.DDL_COL_PNM = X.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM LIMIT 1 ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

--인덱스컬럼 테이블 컬럼순서 Update... (ROW_NUMBER() 함수 이용...(오라클전용)) UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X SET DDL_IDX_COL_ORD = ( SELECT COL_ORD FROM ( SELECT B.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY B.RQST_NO, B.RQST_SNO, B.RQST_DTL_SNO ORDER BY B.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD) AS COL_ORD FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = B.RQST_DTL_SNO WHERE B.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} ORDER BY B.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD ) B WHERE B.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = X.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND B.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO ) WHERE X.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

--인덱스컬럼테이블 인덱스물리명 Update... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X SET DDL_IDX_PNM = ( SELECT A.DDL_IDX_PNM FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_SNO ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

--인덱스컬럼논리명 업데이트
UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X SET DDL_IDX_COL_LNM = (SELECT C.DDL_COL_LNM FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL B ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL C ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_SNO AND C.DDL_COL_PNM = X.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM LIMIT 1 ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL B ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL C ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_SNO AND C.DDL_COL_PNM = X.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM LIMIT 1 )
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 요청서내 중복 컬럼(DDC01) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = D.RQST_DTL_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO AND A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 미존재 컬럼 (DDC02) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_IDX_COL D INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX E ON E.DDL_IDX_ID = D.DDL_IDX_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX F ON F.DDL_IDX_PNM = E.DDL_IDX_PNM AND F.DB_SCH_ID = E.DB_SCH_ID AND F.DDL_TBL_ID = E.DDL_TBL_ID WHERE F.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND F.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 요청중인 컬럼(요청중인 테이블일 경우 전체 적용...) (DDC03) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND COALESCE(D.RVW_STS_CD, '0') != '2' INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX F ON F.DDL_IDX_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_PNM AND F.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND F.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND F.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID AND F.IDX_SPAC_ID = D.IDX_SPAC_ID WHERE F.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} )

--검증쿼리 : 컬럼명 중복 체크 (DDC04) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = D.RQST_DTL_SNO AND A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND A.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO )

--검증쿼리 : 컬럼순서 중복 체크 (DDC05) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL D WHERE D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD = A.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD AND D.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO != A.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO )
--검증쿼리 : 컬럼순서 공백 체크 (DDC06) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD IS NULL
--검증쿼리 : DDL 컬럼 공백 체크 (DDC07) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DDL_COL_ID IS NULL

--검증쿼리 : 변경사항 없을경우 (DDC00) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_IDX_COL E WHERE E.DDL_IDX_ID = A.DDL_IDX_ID AND A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = E.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND COALESCE(A.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD, 0) = COALESCE(E.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD, 0) AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.SORT_TYP, ''), '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(E.SORT_TYP, ''), '_') AND COALESCE(NULLIF(A.OBJ_DESCN, ''), '_') = COALESCE(NULLIF(E.OBJ_DESCN, ''), '_') )
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT B.* FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = B.RQST_DTL_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND B.REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --결재시각 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X SET (DDL_IDX_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) = ( SELECT DDL_IDX_ID, NOW(), A.APRV_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_SNO AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능

--결재시각 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X SET (DDL_COL_ID) = ( SELECT C.DDL_COL_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL B ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = A.DDL_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL C ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_SNO AND C.DDL_COL_PNM = X.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' LIMIT 1 ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL A SET (DDL_IDX_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT D.DDL_IDX_COL_ID , C.DDL_IDX_ID , COALESCE(D.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , D.FRS_RQST_DTM , D.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX C ON B.DDL_IDX_PNM = C.DDL_IDX_PNM AND B.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX_COL D ON C.DDL_IDX_ID = D.DDL_IDX_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX C ON B.DDL_IDX_PNM = C.DDL_IDX_PNM AND B.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX_COL D ON C.DDL_IDX_ID = D.DDL_IDX_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM = A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... )
mapper.sql: DDL_IDX_COL_PNM, DDL_IDX_COL_LNM, DDL_IDX_ID, DDL_COL_ID, DDL_IDX_COL_ORD, SORT_TYP , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID

A.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM, A.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM, A.DDL_IDX_ID, A.DDL_COL_ID, A.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD, A.SORT_TYP , A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , A.RQST_DTL_SNO , A.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_DDL_IDX_COL A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX D ON B.DDL_IDX_ID = D.DDL_IDX_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = C.RQST_DTL_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND D.DDL_IDX_ID = A.DDL_IDX_ID AND C.DDL_IDX_COL_ID = A.DDL_IDX_COL_ID AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND C.VRF_CD = '1' )
mapper.insert: --WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_DDL_IDX_COL (DDL_IDX_COL_ID , ) SELECT A.DDL_IDX_COL_ID , FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = B.RQST_DTL_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_DDL_IDX_COL A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX B INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = C.RQST_DTL_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.DDL_IDX_ID = A.DDL_IDX_ID AND C.DDL_IDX_COL_ID = A.DDL_IDX_COL_ID AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' )
mapper.insert: --WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_DDL_IDX_COL ( DDL_IDX_COL_ID , EXP_DTM , STR_DTM , ) SELECT A.DDL_IDX_COL_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM , FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

--DDL 테이블 추가시 물리모델 컬럼을 추가한다. INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , DDL_IDX_COL_ID , DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , DDL_IDX_ID , DDL_IDX_PNM , RQST_DCD , DDL_COL_ID , DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , SORT_TYP , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , B.RQST_DTL_SNO , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(X.RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_DDL_COL X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} ) + (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RQST_DTL_SNO , C.DDL_IDX_COL_ID , C.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , C.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , B.DDL_IDX_ID , B.DDL_IDX_PNM , B.RQST_DCD , C.DDL_COL_ID , C.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , C.SORT_TYP , C.OBJ_DESCN , C.OBJ_VERS , C.FRS_RQST_DTM , C.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_TBL A INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX_COL C ON C.DDL_IDX_ID = B.DDL_IDX_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}

--DDL 테이블 추가시 물리모델 컬럼을 추가한다. INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , RQST_DCD , DDL_COL_ID , DDL_IDX_PNM , DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , SORT_TYP , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , A.RQST_DTL_SNO
, D.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , D.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , A.RQST_DCD , D.DDL_COL_ID , C.DDL_IDX_PNM , D.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , D.SORT_TYP , D.OBJ_DESCN , D.OBJ_VERS , C.FRS_RQST_DTM , C.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , NOW() , A.RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL B ON B.DB_SCH_ID = A.SRC_DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.DDL_TBL_PNM INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX C ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID AND A.DDL_IDX_PNM = C.DDL_IDX_PNM INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX_COL D ON D.DDL_IDX_ID = C.DDL_IDX_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno, jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.update: UPDATE WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL A SET RQST_DCD = 'DD' , REG_TYP_CD = 'D' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX X WHERE X.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND X.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND X.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL( RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO ,RQST_DTL_SNO ,RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO ,DDL_IDX_COL_ID ,DDL_IDX_COL_PNM ,DDL_IDX_COL_LNM ,RQST_DCD ,VRF_CD ,VRF_RMK ,DDL_IDX_ID ,DDL_IDX_PNM ,DDL_COL_ID ,DDL_IDX_COL_ORD ,SORT_TYP ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,APRV_DTM ,APRV_USER_ID ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , A.RQST_SNO , A.RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , DDL_IDX_COL_ID , DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , A.RQST_DCD , NULL , NULL , A.DDL_IDX_ID , A.DDL_IDX_PNM , DDL_COL_ID , DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , SORT_TYP , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM , A.RQST_USER_ID , NULL , NULL FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX B ON A.DDL_IDX_PNM = B.DDL_IDX_PNM AND A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '2'
